alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Interior Hancock; Northern Penobscot; Southeast Aroostook; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 5:50PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect northeastern Hancock and east central Penobscot Counties... At 549 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was near Medway, or 15 miles northeast of Lincoln...moving south AT 40 MPH. Locations impacted include... Medway, Springfield, Grand Falls, Licoln Township, Lee, Mattawamkeag, Chester, Winn, Burlington, Lowell, Woodville, Kingman, Macwahoc, Saponac, Molunkus and Greenfield. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 245 and 246. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Central Penobscot; Interior Hancock; Northern Penobscot; Southeast Aroostook; Southern Penobscot
